verses.verse: Then Balaam<WH1109> said<WH559> to Balak,<WH1111> "Build<WH1129> seven<WH7651> altars<WH4196> for me here,<WH2088> and prepare<WH3559> seven<WH7651> bulls<WH6499> and seven<WH7651> rams<WH352> for me here.<WH2088>"
And Balak<WH1111> did<WH6213> just<WH9201> as Balaam<WH1109> had spoken,<WH1696> and Balak<WH1111> and Balaam<WH1109> offered<WH5927> up a bull<WH6499> and a ram<WH352> on each altar.<WH4196>

Then Balaam<WH1109> said<WH559> to Balak,<WH1111> "Stand<WH3320> beside<WH5921> your burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH5930> and I will go;<WH1980> perhaps<WH194> the Lord<WH3068> will come<WH7136> to meet<WH7122> me, and whatever<WH4100> <WH1697> He shows<WH7200> me I will tell<WH5046> you." So he went<WH1980> to a bare<WH8205> hill.<WH8205>

Now God<WH430> met<WH7136> Balaam,<WH1109> and he said<WH559> to Him, "I have set<WH6186> up the seven<WH7651> altars,<WH4196> and I have offered<WH5927> up a bull<WH6499> and a ram<WH352> on each altar.<WH4196>"
Then the Lord<WH3068> put<WH7760> a word<WH1697> in Balaam's mouth<WH6310> and said,<WH559> "Return<WH7725> to Balak,<WH1111> and you shall speak<WH1696> thus.<WH3541>"
So he returned<WH7725> to him, and behold,<WH2009> he was standing<WH5324> beside<WH5921> his burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH5930> he and all<WH3605> the leaders<WH8269> of Moab.<WH4124>

And he took<WH5375> up his discourse<WH4912> and said,<WH559> "From Aram<WH6307> Balak<WH1111> has brought<WH5148> me, Moab's king<WH4428> from the mountains<WH2022> of the East,<WH6924> 'Come<WH1980> curse<WH779> Jacob<WH3290> for me, And come,<WH1980> denounce<WH2194> Israel!<WH3478>'
"How<WH4100> shall I curse,<WH6895> whom God<WH410> has not cursed<WH6895>? And how<WH4100> can I denounce,<WH2194> whom the Lord<WH3068> has not denounced<WH2194>?

"As I see<WH7200> him from the top<WH7218> of the rocks,<WH6697> And I look<WH7789> at him from the hills;<WH1389> Behold,<WH2005> a people<WH5971> [who] dwells<WH7931> apart,<WH910> And shall not be reckoned<WH2803> among the nations.<WH1471>

"Who<WH4310> can count<WH4487> the dust<WH6083> of Jacob,<WH3290> Or number<WH4557> the fourth<WH7255> part<WH7255> of Israel<WH3478>? Let me die<WH4191> the death<WH4194> of the upright,<WH3477> And let my end<WH319> be like<WH3644> his!"

Then Balak<WH1111> said<WH559> to Balaam,<WH1109> "What<WH4100> have you done<WH6213> to me? I took<WH3947> you to curse<WH6895> my enemies,<WH340> but behold,<WH2009> you have actually<WH1288> blessed<WH1288> them!"
And he answered<WH6030> and said,<WH559> "Must I not be careful<WH8104> to speak<WH1696> what<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> puts<WH7760> in my mouth<WH6310>?"

Then Balak<WH1111> said<WH559> to him, "Please<WH4994> come<WH1980> with me to another<WH312> place<WH4725> from where<WH834> <WH8033> you may see<WH7200> them, although you will only<WH657> see<WH7200> the extreme<WH7097> end<WH7097> of them, and will not see<WH7200> all<WH3605> of them; and curse<WH6895> them for me from there.<WH8033>"

So he took<WH3947> him to the field<WH7704> of Zophim,<WH6839> to the top<WH7218> of Pisgah,<WH6449> and built<WH1129> seven<WH7651> altars<WH4196> and offered<WH5927> a bull<WH6499> and a ram<WH352> on [each] altar.<WH4196>
And he said<WH559> to Balak,<WH1111> "Stand<WH3320> here<WH3541> beside<WH5921> your burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH5930> while I myself<WH595> meet<WH7136> [the] [Lord] yonder.<WH3541>"
Then the Lord<WH3068> met<WH7136> Balaam<WH1109> and put<WH7760> a word<WH1697> in his mouth<WH6310> and said,<WH559> "Return<WH7725> to Balak,<WH1111> and thus<WH3541> you shall speak.<WH1696>"

And he came<WH935> to him, and behold,<WH2009> he was standing<WH5324> beside<WH5921> his burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH5930> and the leaders<WH8269> of Moab<WH4124> with him. And Balak<WH1111> said<WH559> to him, "What<WH4100> has the Lord<WH3068> spoken<WH1696>?"
Then he took<WH5375> up his discourse<WH4912> and said,<WH559> "Arise,<WH6965> O Balak,<WH1111> and hear;<WH8085> Give<WH238> ear<WH238> to me, O son<WH1121> of Zippor!<WH6834>

"God<WH410> is not a man,<WH376> that He should lie,<WH3576> Nor<WH3808> a son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> that He should repent;<WH5162> Has He said,<WH559> and will He not do<WH6213> it? Or has He spoken,<WH1696> and will He not make<WH6965> it good<WH6965>?
"Behold,<WH2009> I have received<WH3947> [a command] to bless;<WH1288> When He has blessed,<WH1288> then I cannot<WH3808> revoke<WH7725> it.

"He has not observed<WH5027> misfortune<WH205> in Jacob;<WH3290> Nor<WH3808> has He seen<WH7200> trouble<WH5999> in Israel;<WH3478> The Lord<WH3068> his God<WH430> is with him, And the shout<WH8643> of a king<WH4428> is among them.
"God<WH410> brings<WH3318> them out of Egypt,<WH4714> He is for them like the horns<WH8443> of the wild<WH7214> ox.<WH7214>

"For there is no<WH3808> omen<WH5173> against Jacob,<WH3290> Nor<WH3808> is there any divination<WH7081> against Israel;<WH3478> At the proper time<WH6256> it shall be said<WH559> to Jacob<WH3290> And to Israel,<WH3478> what<WH4100> God<WH410> has done.<WH6466>

"Behold,<WH2005> a people<WH5971> rises<WH6965> like a lioness,<WH3833> And as a lion<WH738> it lifts<WH5375> itself; It shall not lie<WH7901> down<WH7901> until<WH5704> it devours<WH398> the prey,<WH2964> And drinks<WH8354> the blood<WH1818> of the slain.<WH2491>"
Then Balak<WH1111> said<WH559> to Balaam,<WH1109> "Do not curse<WH6895> them at all<WH6895> nor<WH3808> bless<WH1288> them at all!<WH1288>"
But Balaam<WH1109> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> to Balak,<WH1111> "Did I not tell<WH1696> you, 'Whatever<WH3605> <WH834> the Lord<WH3068> speaks,<WH1696> that I must do<WH6213>'?"

Then Balak<WH1111> said<WH559> to Balaam,<WH1109> "Please<WH4994> come,<WH1980> I will take<WH3947> you to another<WH312> place;<WH4725> perhaps<WH194> it will be agreeable<WH3474> with God<WH430> that you curse<WH6895> them for me from there.<WH8033>"
So Balak<WH1111> took<WH3947> Balaam<WH1109> to the top<WH7218> of Peor<WH6465> which overlooks<WH5921> <WH6440> <WH8259> the wasteland.<WH3452>

And Balaam<WH1109> said<WH559> to Balak,<WH1111> "Build<WH1129> seven<WH7651> altars<WH4196> for me here<WH2088> and prepare<WH3559> seven<WH7651> bulls<WH6499> and seven<WH7651> rams<WH352> for me here.<WH2088>"
And Balak<WH1111> did<WH6213> just<WH9201> as Balaam<WH1109> had said,<WH559> and offered<WH5927> up a bull<WH6499> and a ram<WH352> on [each] altar.<WH4196>
